issue.title: [Python] Parquet test fail if not enabled
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1181](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1181). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
test test_multiindex_duplicate_values fails if parquet not installed, I believe it just needs the @parquet annotation

comments.body:
